pages.text:
About Holiday Cove
container
container-wrap
About Us
Surrounded by palm trees, Holiday Cove is a representation of Old Florida. Located in the heart of the fishing village of Cortez on Florida’s west coast, the resort offers comfortable paved sites and attentive service by our resort staff. It is ideal for those who are looking for a life style in a natural environment.
A walk across or along the street on a side walk offers a variety of shops, restaurants, a convenience store and post office. Holiday Cove provides its residents with a boat ramp and boat slips for small boats, or for those who prefer it, a covered boat storage facility is located next to the resort. The trip through our canal to the Coastal Waterway (ICW), is 1/4 mile.

Do not enter resort with RV after 7pm
No self-parking of RV (check-in at office upon arrival)
Pool is for paid Rental Guests only
Boats up to 24 ft. max. allowed. Must rent a Boat Slip if you are planning to bring in a boat
Guest must be able to launch boat and park boat trailer (RV’s cannot launch boat or park trailer)
Holiday Cove Resort does not have a vehicle onsite to launch boats or park trailers
Holiday Cove Resort cannot accommodate enclosed trailers, flat bed trailers, golf cart trailers
All motorized vehicles must be parked on your rented site
Proof of liability is to be provided at check-in for boats and golf carts
Please be courteous to your fellow guests and enjoy your stay in our Resort

container
container-wrap
Driving Directions
North or South on I-75 –
Take I-75 to exit 217, State Road 70. Follow SR 70/Oneco Road/53rd Avenue to right at 75th Street (at round about) and left on Cortez Road. Resort is about 2.5 miles on the right.
From Tampa –
Head south approx. 38 miles on I-275 towards bradenton. Exit at US-19 and head south to Cortez Road. Head West on Cortez Road approx. 4.5 miles. We are just before the Bradenton Beach bridge on your right.
From St. Pete –
Head south approx. 16 miles on I-275 towards bradenton. Exit at US-19 and head south to Cortez Road. Head West on Cortez Road approx. 4.5 miles. We are just before the Bradenton Beach bridge on your right.
From Sarasota –
Head north on US 41 towards Bradenton. Head West on Cortez Road approx. 4.5 miles. We are just before the Bradenton Beach bridge on your right.
